entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this morning. 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High 23. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers and risk of a thunderstorm. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening then becoming southwest 20. Low 8. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of a thunderstorm in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High 23. Humidex 25. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 10 May 2023
